name: Plantronics Monitor ME iPhone App
body:
*** Won the first prize in [ATT Wearable Hackathon](http://www.eventbrite.com/e/att-mobile-app-hackathon-wearables-bay-area-tickets-9211167851?utm_campaign=event_reminder&ref=eemaileventremind&utm_medium=email&utm_source=eb_email&utm_term=eventname) held on Feb 8, 2014 ***

We used the Plantronics API for their Concept 1 device to gather accelerometer, gyroscope and pedometer information and developed an app to aid the elderly be monitored for their health and give them emergency access at the tap of a finger.

![concept_device](https://raw.github.com/sairamsankaran/pltmonitorme/master/Images/plantronics_concept1.png)
![status_screen](https://raw.github.com/sairamsankaran/pltmonitorme/master/Images/photo%201.PNG)
![reports_screen](https://raw.github.com/sairamsankaran/pltmonitorme/master/Images/photo%202.PNG)
![details_screen](https://raw.github.com/sairamsankaran/pltmonitorme/master/Images/photo%203.PNG)
![settings_screen](https://raw.github.com/sairamsankaran/pltmonitorme/master/Images/photo%204.PNG)
